title: PlayStation Bought Bungie
description:
Hey, here's the link to buy the plush. https://www.makeship.com/products/knowledge-hub-plush

There ya go. 

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/user-503704039
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/theknowledgehub

Ya know, I do hope Bungie can improve some of its practices under Sony/PlayStation's watchful eye. I had a good few hundred hours in Destiny 2 and dropped off once the sunsetting started.
